The oral exam will be an easy-going chat between you and me. You should explain me your project and maybe tell the story how you came up with the idea. I will have read your notebook and ask you some questions to check whether you understand you own code. The final grade will be based on this exam.
If you want to take the exam, reach out to me in a

fashion and we will find a convenient appointment. In the end you will receive a confirmation over having completed a course that is equivalent to BAM. You will receive the 6 CP with the respective grade.
